Calcium 
Calcium is vital for the development of the fetal skeleton 
and teeth. It also plays a role in maintaining maternal bone 
health. Pregnant women need about 1,000 milligrams of 
calcium daily to support both their own needs and those of 
the developing baby. 3 Dairy p
